Queries.AddInstallmentInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.installment (I_ID, I_Date, Take_Total, Take_Anot, Take_Mine, Take_Data, InsPerMonth, PerMonthPay, InsPay, InsPay_Date, I_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@I_ID, @I_Date, @Take_Total, @Take_Anot, @Take_Mine, @Take_Data, @InsPerMonth, @PerMonthPay, @InsPay, @InsPay_Date, @I_Insrt_Person;
Queries.UpdateInstallmentData: UPDATE ct_db.installment SET I_Date = @I_Date, Take_Total = @Take_Total, Take_Anot = @Take_Anot, Take_Mine = @Take_Mine, Take_Data = @Take_Data, InsPerMonth = @InsPerMonth, PerMonthPay = @PerMonthPay, InsPay = @InsPay, InsPay_Date = @InsPay_Date, I_Insrt_Person = @I_Insrt_Person, I_Updt_Person = @I_Updt_Person, I_Del_Person = @I_Del_Person WHERE I_ID = @I_ID;
